events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position this morning.
The application has been categorized under Engineering due to relevant software development experience.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to manage this candidateâ€™s process.
Initial screening call was conducted and the candidate demonstrated strong knowledge in software development principles.
The candidate responded positively to the screening feedback, expressing enthusiasm about the next interview stage.
A technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate on April 17th to assess coding and system design skills.
The candidate completed the technical interview successfully, showcasing excellent problem-solving and coding abilities.
The HR interview has been scheduled to discuss cultural fit and company benefits with the candidate.
The HR interview concluded positively; the candidate showed strong alignment with our corporate values.
An offer has been proposed to the candidate including attractive compensation and benefits.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer, appreciating the clear role expectations and package.
The candidate accepted the offer enthusiastically and is eager to start with our engineering team.
Onboarding process has started smoothly with the candidate completing all necessary documentation and orientation.
The hiring process is now closed successfully with the new engineer fully integrated into the software development team.
